mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, pw, name, birthdate, email, phone, location) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birthdate}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{location})
mapper.select: SELECT uid, id, name, birthdate, email, phone, location FROM user WHERE id = #{total} or name = #{total} or email = #{total} or phone = #{total} or location = #{total}
